Description: According the existing ECS instance, clone a set of ECS instanes with the same configuration(InstanceType, ImageId, InternetChargeType, InternetMaxBandwidthIn, InternetMaxBandwidthOut, system disk, data disk configurations, VPC properties). The user needs to specify SourceInstanceId.

SourceInstanceId.Description: The source ECS instance id to be cloned
SourceInstanceId.Label: Source Instance Id

NewImageId.Description: Image Id, represents the image resource to startup one ECS instance, View image resources
NewImageId.Label: ECS Image Id

InstanceName.Description: [2, 128] alphanumeric letters, underline, dot or hyphen
InstanceName.ConstraintDescription: [2, 128] characters, consists of uppercase letter, lowercase letter, number or special characters.
InstanceName.Label: ECS Instance Name

MaxAmount.Description: The maximum of ECS instances, must be greater than or equal to the minimum.
MaxAmount.Label: The Maximum Of ECS Instances

MinAmount.Description: The minimum of ECS instances, must be less than or equal to the maximum.
MinAmount.Label: The Minimum Of ECS Instances

Password.Description: The login password of ECS instance
Password.ConstraintDescription: [8, 30] characters, consists of uppercase letter, lowercase letter, number or special characters.
Password.Label: ECS Instance Password

BackendServerWeight.Description: The weight of backend server added to SLB
BackendServerWeight.Label: Backend Server Weight

InstanceIds.Description: The instance id list of created ecs instance

PublicIps.Description: Public IP address list of created ecs instance.
